Name: Naman Surin
Reviews: Should try shawarma either veg or non veg, both are really good, also has a range of variety of pizza's, biryaani, pakoda's and many other things to eat

Name: Md Sahidullah
Reviews: You will have unique Biriyani of "India" in this small jhups. They prepare Biriyani in Hyderabadi style which is not common here in Bengal. I used to visit this place only for Biriyani. I have tried other items such as â€¦MoreYou will have unique Biriyani of "India" in this small jhups. They prepare Biriyani in Hyderabadi style which is not common here in Bengal. I used to visit this place only for Biriyani. I have tried other items such as Sawarma, Chicken Drumstick, Pizza but those are of average quality.The restaurant is located very close to drain and dustbin which make the environment unhygienic.

Name: Lavisha Parab
Reviews: They serve superawesome biryani. Their biryani with mayo is just so tasty. I'd never thought Biryani with mayo would taste great.

Name: Ramanarayan Mohanty
Reviews: Food is good and cheap. Specially chicken swarma is very good and tasty.

Name: sanjay reddy
Reviews: Arguably the best Pizzas, shawarmas, mayonnaise available in kgp. Decent price ranges. Delivery within 30 minutes.

Name: vignesh shaj
Reviews: Definitely the only outlet which serves Arabian dishes. Tasty shawarma and quick delivery.

Name: Jeet Majumder
Reviews: It's a small shop but serves good quality food. For only 60 rupees, you can have Shawarma Roll and it is yummy, most importantly. Biryani is also tasty.

Name: Karthik
Reviews: Biryani , pizza and shawarma are the best

Name: Mohammad Jamil Akhtar Ansari
Reviews: The first restaurant to start Pizza and Garlic Bread and the only restaurant to serve Shawarma. The first to deliver food in the IIT Kharagpur campus. Popular among the students. Operating since 2010.

Name: pappu akhatar
Reviews: Biryani lebnis shawrma italian pizza cheken lolipop drum stks pakoda

Name: Bhavya Tomar
Reviews: Chicken shwarma is a must try
